mapper.select: select * from action where JSON_CONTAINS(steps->'$[*].actionId', '${actionId}', '$') or JSON_CONTAINS(depends->'$[*]', '${actionId}', '$') or JSON_CONTAINS(action_imports->'$[*]', '${actionId}', '$')

select * from action where state = 2 and (project_id = #{projectId} or (project_id is null and (platforms is null or platforms = '[]' or JSON_CONTAINS(platforms->'$[*]', '${platform}', '$')))) and type = #{type}
